name: text
title: Text
description: Data items that can contain a mixture of letters, numbers and symbols.

name: number
title: Number
description: Data items that relate to a numeric value.

name: dateTime
title: Date/time
description: Data items that relate to moments-in-time.

name: choice
title: Choice
description: Data items that relate to a finite, known set of values.

name: ref
title: Reference
description: Data items whose value can relate to another entity
